body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting us today. My name is Ronald Reed and I represent Car Dealership X. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello Ronald, my name is Rebecca Rodriguez.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Rebecca. To assist you better, could you please provide me with your email address?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. And could you kindly confirm your phone number, starting with the area code, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course. It is five five five, nine six seven, one two three four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Got it. Thank you, Rebecca, for sharing that information. Is there anything else you would like to discuss with me today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, thank you, Ronald. I feel relieved that my privacy concern has been addressed.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Rebecca. Thank you for reaching out to us. If you have any more questions in the future, feel free to contact us again. Have a great day!

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, Ronald. You too, have a great day!
